name: PENNSYLVANIA NATIONAL MUTUAL CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant, v. J. C. PENNEY CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Pennsylvania National Mutual Casualty Insurance v. J. C. Penney Casualty Insurance

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
EAGEN, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision in this case.
parties: PENNSYLVANIA NATIONAL MUTUAL CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant, v. J. C. PENNEY CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellee.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
EAGEN, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision in this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: F. Lee Shipman, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Sanford S. Marateck, Shamokin, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
415 A.2d 87
PENNSYLVANIA NATIONAL MUTUAL CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant, v. J. C. PENNEY CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 23, 1980.
Decided June 18, 1980.
F. Lee Shipman, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Sanford S. Marateck, Shamokin, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
